citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on 10-
SEP-21. The inspector spoke to the licensee by phone and he was unable to return home within an hour.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on 10-
SEP-21.  The inspector spoke to the licensee by phone and he was unable to return home within an hour. 
 
 
 
End Section
